entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
